TypeSignature.Value: .class public auto ansi beforefieldinit ArrayEditor extends System.ComponentModel.Design.CollectionEditor

Docs.summary: Provides a user interface for editing arrays at design time.

remarks.format:
## Remarks This editor can be used to edit arrays within the design-time environment.
## Examples The following code example demonstrates applying the <xref:System.ComponentModel.EditorAttribute?displayProperty=fullName> to a property.
[!code-cs[ArrayEditorExample#1](~/add/codesnippet/CSharp/t-system.componentmodel._56_1.cs)] [!code-vb[ArrayEditorExample#1](~/add/codesnippet/VisualBasic/t-system.componentmodel._56_1.vb)] [!code-cpp[ArrayEditorExample#1](~/add/codesnippet/CPP/t-system.componentmodel._56_1.cpp)]

remarks.format: ## Remarks The default implementation returns the item type of the array.
